医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
精神分裂症的遗传和环境因素精神分裂症会影响全球数百万，但其原因仍然是最大的医疗谜团之一。在一项独家基因组新闻访谈中，精神病遗传学的开创性研究员Consuelo Walss-Bass博士分享了遗传易感性和环境因素如何导致严重的精神健康障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/genetic-and-environmental-factors-in-schizizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/genetic-and-environmental-factors-in-schizizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19E822AF-2340-44FA-BFF8-51CFD4EC0736 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 00:20:01 -0400 Genetic and environmental factors in schizophrenia
研究表明心理学家发现大多数有关多动症的Tiktok视频具有误导性，通常使正常行为过度概括为症状。这些视频塑造了年轻人的看法，并有助于自我诊断趋势的上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/tiktok-fuels-adhd-self-diarosis-with-misleadent-content-content-study-shows.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/tiktok-fuels-adhd-self-diarosis-with-misleadent-content-content-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5007531C-EC35-406C-81CD-4F0A344D2818 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 23:56:00 -0400 TikTok fuels ADHD self-diagnosis with misleading content, study shows
研究表明，尿液中的红酒生物标志物可以预测炎症水平研究人员发现，白藜芦醇在尿液中的特定代谢产物准确地反映了红酒的消耗。这些生物标志物与传统食品调查不同，这些生物标志物与心血管风险的老年人的炎症减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/study-shows-red-wine-biomarkers-in-rine-can-predict-inflammation-leflammation-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/study-shows-red-wine-wine-biomarkers-in-urine-can-predict-infledict-inflammation-leflammation-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5222cf37-738d-4be6b21f-f8e50b9ecab7 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 23:45:00 -0400 Study shows red wine biomarkers in urine can predict inflammation levels
Integra Biosciences详细介绍了血清学手段的演变和未来在过去的40年中，Integra Biosciences在促进血清学移液领域的领域中发挥了关键作用，并且刚刚创建了一篇有趣的文章，涵盖了血清学移动器控制器开发的快节奏历史。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/integra-biosciences-details-the-volution-and-volution-and-future-future-future of-serological-pipetting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/integra-biosciences-details-the-volution-and-volution-and-future-future-of-serological-serological pipetting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A923329-9E03-4144-A5DA-90ACE5C7099 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 23:44:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences details the evolution and future of serological pipetting
早期抗生素暴露可能会增加生命后期糖尿病的风险小鼠的新研究表明，在婴儿期关键发育范围内暴露于抗生素会阻碍胰腺中产生胰岛素细胞的生长，并可能会增加生命后期糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/Early-antibiotic-exposure-may-boost-risk-of-diabetes-later-in-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/Early-antibiotic-exposure-may-boost-risk-of-diabetes-later-in-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1054dc2f-be24-4301-b4ac-e01ad2db642c Tue, 25 Mar 2025 23:15:46 -0400 Early antibiotic exposure may boost risk of diabetes later in life

研究揭示了寨卡病毒和登革热病毒的独特感染策略寨卡病毒和登革热病毒是非常亲密的。两者都是蚊子传播的黄病毒，并且都专门感染宿主的树突状细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/study-reveals-distinct-infection-infection-nfection-strategies-of-zika-onga-and-dengue-viruess.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/study-reveals-distinct-infection-infection-nfection-strategies-of-zika-onga-and-dengue-viruess.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93f0c7af-0a70-44d7-968b-7dc67cb86dd7 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:53:06 -0400 Study reveals distinct infection strategies of Zika and dengue viruses

新研究阐明了CDK7在癌细胞增殖中的作用为了使器官发育，生长和再生，细胞必须增殖。但是，当该过程出现问题时，导致细胞生长不受控制时，癌症可能会出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/new-research-sheds-light-on-cdk7s-cand-role-in-cancer-cancer-cell-cell-proferation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/new-research-sheds-neds-light-on-cdk7s-role-in-cancer-incancer-cell-cell-proferation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6888ec3c-e01a-4695-A947-3E017F26EF98 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:47:00 -0400 New research sheds light on CDK7's role in cancer cell proliferation
为什么Mānuka不再是新西兰唯一的治愈蜂蜜奥克兰技术大学的新研究表明，八家新西兰原始的蜂蜜（Mānuka）超越了麦努卡（Mānuka），具有独特的抗氧化剂，抗菌和生物活性特性。百里香和山毛榉蜜菜因其维生素C和多酚含量而脱颖而出。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/why-manuka-isnt-the-healing-healing-honeing-from-new-new-zealand-anymore.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250325/why-manuka-isnt-the-healing-healing-honeing-honey-from-new-new--zealand-anymore.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=960600AA-403F-4AF-4AFE-B2B3-60D135AA56E1 Tue, 25 Mar 2025 22:43:00 -0400 Why Mānuka isn't the only healing honey from New Zealand anymore
